Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Represents a game controller. Manages the initialization and movements of game entities (characters and items), board and walls.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrienne Kwan

      public Point moveCharacter​(Command move)
      Calls mainCharacter's move method
      Parameters:
      move - user's input command

    • moveMovingEnemies

      public void moveMovingEnemies()
      Updates movements of enemies by calling enemies' move methods

    • manageBonusRewards

      public void manageBonusRewards()
      Updates collection of bonus rewards. Creates new bonuses at random, and removes expired bonuses. Currently we only want to have one bonus reward at a time, but have chosen to leave bonuses as a Map for flexibility and consistency.

    • checkWall

      public boolean checkWall​(Point pt)
      Checks whether a point overlaps with a wall
      Parameters:
      pt - the point to be checked
      Returns:
      whether or not the point overlaps with a wall

    • render

      public void render​(Graphics g)
      Calls render methods of all entities

    • checkRegCollision

      public int checkRegCollision​(Rectangle mBound, boolean remove)
      Checks for collision between given Rectangle and regular rewards locations
      Parameters:
      mBound - Rectangle to check
      remove - whether to remove colliding regular reward or not
      Returns:
      value of regular reward if collision, and 0 if no collision

    • checkBonusCollision

      public int checkBonusCollision​(Rectangle mBound, boolean remove)
      Checks for collision between given Rectangle and bonus rewards locations
      Parameters:
      mBound - Rectangle to check
      remove - whether to remove colliding regular reward or not
      Returns:
      value of bonus reward if collision, and 0 if no collision

    • checkPunCollision

      public int checkPunCollision​(Rectangle mBound, boolean remove)
      Checks for collision between given Rectangle and punishment locations
      Parameters:
      mBound - Rectangle to check
      remove - whether to remove colliding regular reward or not
      Returns:
      value of punishment if collision, and 0 if no collision

    • checkEnemyCollision

      public int checkEnemyCollision​(Rectangle mBound, boolean remove)
      Checks for collision between given Rectangle and Enemy locations
      Parameters:
      mBound - Rectangle to check
      remove - whether to remove colliding regular reward or not
      Returns:
      large negative integer value if collision, and 0 if no collision
